metadata.title: CVE-2022-28732 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A carefully crafted request on WeblogPlugin could trigger an XSSvulnerability on Apache JSPWiki, which could allow the attacker to executejavascript in the victim's browser and get some sensitive information aboutthe victim. Apache JSPWiki users should upgrade to 2.11.3 or later.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
